name: Black and White Crossed 10" Cherry Bowl
description:
Black and White Crossed 10" Cherry Bowl


This beautiful 10" wooden bowl is perfect for a fresh salad or fruit in the Kitchen. Each carefully designed with a black and white cross dipped pattern. The colored portion is a soft rubbery plastic which makes them durable and non-slip. The wood is left natural, YAY.
________________________
BEAUTY IS IN THE DETAILS

Size: Approximately 10 inch (25.4cm ) diameter at the top x  5/8 inch (1.59cm) Rim, 3.5 inches (8.89 cm) Deep
Origin: Minnesota, USA
Materials: Solid Cherry Wood, Synthetic Rubber

Each bowl has been hand dipped by ME. I don’t measure or tape the bowls to create perfectly identical bowls. I believe beauty is in organic lines and natural movement, which means the color dipped portion may vary between bowls and may show more or less wood as your move around the bowl. There also may be small bubble marks which are the natural texture and reaction to the dip on the wood.
Wood grains are part of the natural beauty of the wood (wood grains make me HAPPY). Grain colors can vary from light to dark brow or even a greyish hue. These colors should not be construed as flaws but part of the uniqueness of the item.


*Please note: due to the reaction of the dip and the wood there are small bubbles that occur on the bottom and sides of the bowl (see last picture for detailed photo)*
